metadata.title: X Minus One and Dimension X: All Surviving 172 Old Time Radio Episodes in MP3 [USB Thumb Drive]
features: X Minus One was an extension of Dimension X which aired on NBC from 1950-51. The first fifteen scripts used for X Minus One were scripts used in Dimension X; it soon found its own little niche.
These Sci-Fi radio series include all surviving 172 episodes in the mp3 format on a USB flash drive that can be played on an automobile entertainment system or a computer equipped with a USB port.
Episodes are tagged so that the program's image and the episode's title are displayed when playing.
Please note that due to the age of the recordings, the sound quality may not be at today's HD standards.
USB flash drive color may vary.
description: This collection includes all surviving episodes of X Minus One & Dimension X Old Time Radio Series on a USB flash drive. Please note that due to the age of the series, the sound quality may not be at the HD quality we are currently used to. Actual USB flash drive color may vary. Partial list of episode titles is as follows:X Minus One 1. No Contact 2. The Parade 3. Mars Is Heaven 4. Universe 5. Knock 6. The Man in the Moon 7. Perigi's Wonderful Dolls 8. The Green Hills of Earth 9. Dr Grimshaw's Sanitarium 10. Nightmare 11. The Embassy 12. The Veldt 13. Almost Human 14. Courtesy 15. Cold Equations 16. Shanghaied 17. The Martian Death March 18. The Castaways 19. And the Moon Be Still as Bright 20. First Contact ...Dimension X 1. Outer Limit 2. With Folded Hands 3. Report On Barnhouse Effect 4. No Contact 5. Knock 6. Almost Human 7. The Lost Race 8. To The Future 9. Embassy 10. The Green Hills of Earth 11. There Will Come Soft Rain 12. Destination Moon 13. A Logic Named Joe 14. Mars Is Heaven 15. The Man in the Moon 16. Beyond Infinity 17. Potters of Firsk 18. Perigis Wonderful Dolls 19. The Castaways 20. The Martian Chronicles...
